decks.notes: The main focus of this deck is to control the game by utilizing a mix of powerful spells, counters, and removal to disrupt your opponent's strategy. Marchesa, Dealer of Death serves as the commander, providing a strong control element with her abilities. The deck includes a range of versatile cards such as Demonic Tutor, Force of Will, and Snapcaster Mage to manipulate the board and maintain dominance. Additionally, the deck features a selection of threats like Magmatic Sinkhole and Murktide Regent to apply pressure and close out the game. By carefully managing resources and leveraging your spells effectively, you can outmaneuver your opponent and secure victory through strategic control tactics.

The deck focuses on utilizing the Partner commanders, Thrasios and Tymna, to create a fast-paced aggressive strategy. The deck includes a variety of mana dorks and ramp spells to accelerate the mana base and allow for quick deployments of threats. It also includes a toolbox of creatures and spells for flexibility and adaptability in different matchups. The deck aims to pressure opponents early with efficient creatures like Tarmogoyf and utility creatures like Dark Confidant while also disrupting their game plan with removal spells like Swords to Plowshares and Abrupt Decay. The deck's goal is to maintain a steady stream of threats and disruption to overwhelm opponents and secure a quick victory.

This deck focuses on aggressive strategies with Phelia, Exuberant Shepherd as the commander. The goal is to quickly deploy threats and disrupt the opponent's board while applying pressure with efficient creatures and removal spells. Cards like Skyclave Apparition and Swords to Plowshares help control the board while creatures like Blade Splicer and Elite Spellbinder provide a strong clock. The deck also utilizes powerful equipment like Batterskull and Shadowspear to enhance its creatures. With a mix of disruptive elements like Containment Priest and Council's Judgment, as well as card advantage engines like Stoneforge Mystic and Recruiter of the Guard, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent and secure victory through a combination of aggression and disruption.

The deck focuses on controlling the game by countering opponent's spells, removing threats, and disrupting their strategy with various spells like Thoughtseize and Fatal Push. The commander, Tivit, Seller of Secrets, provides card advantage and can help dig for answers. The deck includes a blend of versatile instant-speed spells like Cryptic Command and Force of Will, alongside efficient removal like Swords to Plowshares and Toxic Deluge to deal with threats efficiently. The mana base is optimized for consistency and includes fetch lands to ensure the deck can access the necessary colors of mana for its spells. Overall, the deck aims to out-value opponents and maintain control of the game until it can close out with a powerful finisher.
